REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to preventing housing discrimination against victims of domestic violence; repealer
Summary: Prevents housing discrimination against victims of domestic violence.
LawCode: Rpld & add ยง292 sub 34, amd ยง296, Exec L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to preventing housing discrimination against victims of domestic violence; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
